name: qupro
cooked:
Hi,

Incluiding OSHW data in Wikidata (the Wikipedia database engine) we could have, for example:

<li>- Components datasheets: <a href="https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?q=Q25814150">https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?q=Q25814150</a></li>


<li>- Project components: <a href="https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=27000417">https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=27000417</a></li>


<li>- Manufacturer Catalogs: <a href="https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=25815029">https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=25815029</a></li>


<li>- Relations graph view between them: <a href="https://angryloki.github.io/wikidata-graph-builder/?property=P527&item=Q27000417">https://angryloki.github.io/wikidata-graph-builder/?property=P527&item=Q27000417</a></li>

<li>- Autogenerated Lists: <a href="https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=25859519">https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=25859519</a></li>

<li>- Integrated information: wikidata items has a property call "source repository" that you can use to link code like here <a href="https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?q=Q25026145">https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?q=Q25026145</a> A 3D file property is comming to wikidata items <a href="https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T3790">https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T3790</a></li>

There is more information here: https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/WikiObject

this could empower OSHW community,what do you think?

greetings
raw:
Hi, Incluiding OSHW data in Wikidata (the Wikipedia database engine) we could have, for example:
  • - Components datasheets: https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?q=Q25814150
  • - Project components: https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=27000417
  • - Manufacturer Catalogs: https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=25815029
  • - Relations graph view between them: https://angryloki.github.io/wikidata-graph-builder/?property=P527&item=Q27000417
  • - Autogenerated Lists: https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?&q=25859519
  • - Integrated information: wikidata items has a property call "source repository" that you can use to link code like here https://tools.wmflabs.org/reasonator/?q=Q25026145 A 3D file property is comming to wikidata items https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T3790
    • There is more information here: https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/WikiObject this could empower OSHW community,what do you think? greetings
